newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Hyundai in $3.6 mln trailer Japan deal.
newsitem.headline: Hyundai in $3.6 mln trailer Japan deal.

text.p: South Korea's Hyundai Precision and Industry Co said on Monday it will export $3.6 million worth of aluminium gate trailers to Japan this month.
The company said in a statement the 191 units were purchased by Sumisho Machinery Trade Corp. This will be the first shipment of Korean-made trailers to Japan, it claimed.
Through the expansion of its after service and sales network in Japan, Hyundai said it plans to raise its exports to the nation to 550 units, valued at $10 million, next year.
